org.openorb.util
Class NumberCache

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.openorb.util.NumberCache
public final class NumberCache
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for obtaining Number instances. This class caches the most commonly used values.

Author:
Richard G Clark
